nodes.text: The Imperial Nebulon-B frigate Firestorm failed to destroy the Alliance Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Stimsenj'kat which was having cargo transferred from Transport Group Renhoek, which was made up of at least six Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports. The Firestorm was destroyed by the Stimsenj'kat, along with Keyan Farlander and a few other Rebel pilots.
